section.section: In this section, "classroom teacher" means a teacher who is primarily responsible and accountable for the students in that class.

By the beginning of the 2012-2013 academic year, the Department shall develop a uniform data collection method to track the number of students who regularly participate in a classroom teacher's class.

The uniform data collection method developed under paragraph (1) of this subsection shall reflect the number of students who participate in a classroom teacher's class as of September 30 of each year.

text.section:
Beginning with the 2012-2013 academic year, each county board shall:
Implement the uniform data collection method developed under subsection (b) of this section; and
Report the results of the data collection to the Department on or before December 1 of each year.

On or before January 31 of each year, the Department shall report to the General Assembly, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, on the data obtained under subsection (c)(2) of this section.
